rules.name: CONTADO_NO_Ok
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 OR 16 OR 17 OR 18 OR 19)
rules.label: CONTADO - NO Ok

rules.name: CREDITO_NO_Ok
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 OR 16 OR 17 OR 18 OR 19 OR 20)
rules.label: CREDITO - NO Ok
